description: Try our easy to follow Noodle Omelettes With Honey Prawns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Noodle Omelettes With Honey Prawns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pinch ground white pepper, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cook noodles as per packet instructions. Drain. Combine honey, vinegar and soy in a bowl.

Heat 2 tsp oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add prawns and 3 tbs honey mixture and cook for 2 minutes, tossing often, or until prawns change colour and are just cooked. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm. Clean pan.

Combine noodles, egg, onion and pepper. Heat 1 tsp oil in frying pan over medium heat. Add a quarter of the egg mixture and cook for 2 minutes or until just cooked. Turn and cook for a further 2 minutes. Transfer to a serving plate and cover loosely to keep warm. Repeat to make 4 omelettes.

Place one lettuce leaf onto one half of each omelette, then top each with prawn, carrot and sprouts and fold omelettes in half over filling. Drizzle each with remaining honey mixture and garnish with coriander and chilli. Serve immediately.
